players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "I believe we should focus our suspicions on Charlie, given the sudden and unexplained death of Bob during the night."
You: "I agree with Diana. The mysterious death of Bob warrants our attention towards Charlie."
Charlie: "I'm innocent, I swear. Bob was a threat to us all and I acted out of self-preservation."

Diana: "Let us not jump to conclusions based on assumptions. We need solid evidence before making accusations. Charlie, I understand your statement, but we cannot ignore the circumstances surrounding Bob's death. It is crucial that we remain vigilant and work together to uncover the truth."

You: "Let us not forget that we are all in this together, and it is important that we trust each other as we work to uncover the truth behind Bob's death. We should keep an open mind and consider all possibilities before making any accusations."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Charlie
